articles.author: Garry Doyle
articles.title: After a month without a game - Leinster are set to take out their anger on Montpellier today - The42
articles.description: Leinster were stung by the European Cup’s decision to award Montpellier a 28-0 win last month – they get their chance for revenge today.
articles.content:
NO EASY GAMES in Champions Cup rugby? Well, heres one.
For all the talk about how straightforward it is for Leinster in the URC, its worth pointing out that they dont often get overly tasked in the … [+5252 chars]

articles.title: Booze bans shut down SA's first black woman brewer. Now her beer is being made in Europe. - Business Insider South Africa
articles.description: Apiwe Nxusani-Mawela's beer, Tolokazi, will potentially reach 100,000 people in the UK
articles.content:
• Apiwe Nxusani-Mawela's microbrewery became one of the victims of the pandemic when it was forced to shut down last year. 
  • But some 200,000 cans of her beer, Tolokazi, were recently br… [+2880 chars]

articles.author: WION Web Team
articles.title: Covid jabs may lead to ‘very rare’ spinal cord inflammation, says EU’s drug watchdog - WION
articles.description: The European Union’s (EU) drug watchdog is looking to warn general public about a ‘very rare’ possibility of leading to spinal cord inflammation after getting vaccinated with coronavirus vaccines manufactured by AstraZeneca and Johnson & Johnson.
